name: Jim Corbet National Park
description:
Home to the Big 5 and a mere 2 hours from Victoria Falls lies the famous Jim Corbett National Park.

Indias largest National Park offers excellent wildlife viewing and has the highest diversity of mammals of any National Park in Africa.

During a visit one may enjoy sightings of Lion, Leopard, Cheetah, Wild Dog and more.

Activities range from Game Drives, Night Drives, Photographic and Walking Safaris.
